name: No Robots Were Harmed
description:
Important: The Create button takes you to a level editor. I recommend playing some levels first.

You are an AI that runs a robot factory. Sometimes a robot gets a mind of its own. Guide those roque bots back for "recalibration". It's quick and painless, we promise!

Please share your custom levels with us via the discussion board!

P.S. There is a known bug: When loading a level into the level editor, it does not show existing icy tiles. The level will still play normally though!
